fields.label: Survey form group ID
fields.name: group_id
fields.instructions: This is required to output the correct field group for the community survey page.   You can get the ID number by going to the "Custom Fields" "Field Groups" sub-page and clicking on the "Our Connected Neighbourhoods Survey" group link.  In the browser address bar you will see a url which looks something like this ...'wp-admin/post.php?post=1258&action=ed'...  The ID number you need is after 'post=' (so in this example it would be 1258).
